News.Title: V.L. Infraprojects Secures Rs 26.37 Crore Order for Water Supply and Drainage Projects
News.Summary: V.L. Infraprojects has been awarded a contract worth Rs 26.37 crore for water supply and drainage projects. This order represents a significant business opportunity for the company in the infrastructure sector.
